LightningComponentBundle.description: Renders a related list of records who share a parent with the current record

property.name: sObjectTypeName
property.label: Parent SObject Type Name
property.description: SObject Type Name of the parent record. For example 'Account'

property.name: parentRecordId
property.label: Parent Record Id
property.description: Id of the parent record. For example {!record.accountId}

property.name: relationshipName
property.label: Relationship Name
property.description: Relationship name (from the parent record) whose related records should be listed. For example 'cases'

property.name: sObjectTypeName
property.label: SObject Type Name
property.description: SObject Type Name of the this record. For example 'Opportunity'

property.name: parentSObjectTypeName
property.label: Parent SObject Type Name
property.description: SObject Type Name of the parent record. For example 'Account'

property.name: parentIdField
property.label: Parent Id Field API Name
property.description: Name of the field that holds the parent id. For example 'AccountId'

property.name: relationshipName
property.label: Relationship API Name
property.description: Relationship name (from the parent record) whose related records should be listed. For example 'cases'
